programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Taken / Scorcher
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Detectives Pam Childs and Selles Morris search for a 14-year-old girl who has been snatched by a 19-year-old with possible gang connections. The hunt leads detectives to a hotel district at the edge of town, through gang territory, and across the state.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Mother's Day / Somebody Knows
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 With Mother's Day approaching, Det. Bob Berent meets with another anguished family. The son and daughter of a 48-year-old Iraqi immigrant returned from work to find her gone. She has no ID and no money, and her children believe she may have delusions.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - A History of Violence
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 When a young woman and her babies vanish, detectives discover that a second woman and her baby are missing, too, and one man may be responsible for both disappearances. Detectives Lorna Conley, Nannette Ansley, and Pam Childs must use all their skills.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Desperate Measures/The Big City
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Detectives Ayanna Corbin and Michael Cochran rush to save a missing mother of four children who's left behind a suicide note. And Detective Bob Berent goes looking for a disoriented and confused woman who's wandering the streets of Chicago.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Deleted/Cruel Streets
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 When an aspiring model disappears, Det. Joe Gentile suspects an online predator may have kidnapped her. And Det. Pam Childs races to find a missing man with mental disabilities before he becomes a victim of street violence.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Trail of Evidence
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In Harris County Texas, a 38-year-old man is stabbed to death in his own home leaving behind two children and his wife. Investigators track down the suspect thanks to surveillance video and some good old fashion detective work.

programme.title: The First 48: Missing Persons - Taken / Scorcher
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Detectives Pam Childs and Selles Morris search for a 14-year-old girl who has been snatched by a 19-year-old with possible gang connections. The hunt leads detectives to a hotel district at the edge of town, through gang territory, and across the state.

programme.title: A Day in Paradise - Uninhabited Island, NE Fiji Islands
programme.desc: Season 1, Filmed in 2013 by David Huting, the tiny island is hidden off the northeastern coast of the outer Fiji Islands (near Taveuni), and boasts a perfect white sandy beach.

programme.title: Moalboal White Beach: Philippines - Moalboal White Beach: Philippines
programme.desc: Season 1, Exploring the Basdaku Beach in the Philippines.

programme.title: Soothing Relaxation - Misc Scenes from Around the World
programme.desc: Season 1, Viewers are oohed and aahed to stunning scenery from the California (Big Sur, Yosemite), Hawaii, Utah, Argentina, Mexico, Tahiti, Oregon, and more.

programme.title: Awe Of Nature - Playa Coson, Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Season 1, A charming hut on the Dominican Republic's Playa Coson.

programme.title: Natural Beauty - Soaring Views, Greece
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 17 The splendor of Greece from an aerial view.

programme.title: A Day in Santorini - A Day in Santorini
programme.desc: Season 1, A visual journey through the coastal village of Oia, found on the far tip of Santorini Island.

programme.title: Redwood Forest Rejuvenation - Redwood Forest Rejuvenation
programme.desc: Season 1, Transporting to the magical redwood forests of Northern California and soaking up the healing energies that only pure nature can provide, with multiple healing scenes from the old-grove forest, paired with real-life stereo nature sounds.

programme.title: Ulun Danu Temple: Indonesia - Ulun Danu Temple: Indonesia
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The tranquility of an ancient temple and the serene views of its surrounding waters.

programme.title: Sunny Getaways - Caribbean Sea, Guadeloupe
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Naturescape offers you an escape to a world of stunning nature scenes, all set to peaceful soundtracks. Relax to a crackling fireplace, soar over a tropical paradise, or get inspired by a sparkling night sky, all from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Yosemite Magic: Yosemite National Park - Yosemite Magic: Yosemite National Park
programme.desc: Season 1, Yosemite is known all over the world for its granite cliffs, waterfalls, and giant sequoias.

programme.title: Fall in the Forest - Fall in the Forest
programme.desc: Season 1, Sweeping yellow autumn mountain scenes.

programme.title: Pancake Rocks: New Zealand - Pancake Rocks: New Zealand
programme.desc: Season 1, New Zealand's Pancake Rocks offer a mesmerizing combination of geology, natural beauty, and coastal splendor, with intricate rock patterns and shapes formed over millions of years of wind and water exposure.

programme.title: Calm of Nature - Calm of Nature
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Immerse yourself in the beauty of the world.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Imette St. Guillen
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 217 The events leading up to a horrific murder, the large-scale police investigation that identified the killer and how the powerful strands of forensics were able to link the killer to other victims.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Murder in The Mountains
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 218 The story of the brutal death of Phyllis Murphy, how her family never thought they’d see justice, and how after almost two decades, modern forensic technology eventually led police to her murderer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Bare Bones
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 219 The story of a custody battle drove a family apart and how dogged detective work and the revolutionary areas of DNA and cyber forensics eventually solved a seemingly unsolvable crime.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Sick Ripper
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 220 The tragic story of Nilsa Arizmendi, how police tracked down her murderer and how a chance happening and detailed forensics investigation uncovered Connecticut’s most prolific serial killer.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Mommie Dearest
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 A woman is bludgeoned to death in her own home, and her severely handicapped teenage daughter goes missing. When investigators eventually catch up with the young woman, they hear a baffling story of a mother's toxic love.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - The Luchalooters
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Celebrity little people and twin wrestlers Jorge and Miguel have a larger-than-life appetite for drugs and alcohol. And when they're both found dead after a wild night of partying, an autopsy reveals the culprit is eye drops.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Bad Fortune
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 A high-rolling, high-priced fortune-teller is slaughtered, and detectives must decipher a bizarre set of clues that weave superstition and brutality in equal measure.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Stranger Than Fiction
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 A wannabe serial killer ropes in his first unsuspecting victim. But it turns out that killing in real life is trickier than it looks on TV.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Snitch Who Kills
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 78 Law enforcement investigates a series of unsolved murders in the state of Colorado over the course of a year.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Too Late Too Say Sorry
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 79 A triple homicide in small town Maine rocks a community and destroys a family.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Mad Maksim
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 80 A disgruntled man snaps and goes on killing spree, terrorizing the entire borough of Brooklyn, New York.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Clear Lake Murders
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 81 Four young adults are gunned down inside an affluent home in a quiet suburb of Houston, Texas.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Brother in Arms
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 82 A bloodbath inside a Beverly Hills mansion sparks a highly publicized investigation.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Down in Flames
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 83 The discovery of a burned body on the side of the road kickstarts a race to find a killer.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Deadly Dance
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 In Las Vegas, a professional dancer disappears without a trace. Her boyfriend provides no leads. Finally, after weeks of dead ends, a tip blows the case wide open. At trial, the prosecution has an eyewitness and plenty of evidence on their side.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Date Night
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 Just four days before Christmas 2013, a single mother of five is shot twice, dumped in a East Cleveland street, and ran over by the killer.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Trapped in Place
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A beloved family man is fatally injured in a mysterious accident.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - The Passenger
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 A murdered 911 dispatcher is found behind the wheel of a wrecked sedan.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Silicon Avatar
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Picard struggles to communicate with a mysterious, destructive force before a visiting scientist can destroy it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Disaster
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 The lives of the crew are in Troi's hands when a natural disaster forces her to take over as captain of the seriously damaged Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Game
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 6 The fate of the Federation is in Wesley Crusher's hands when he returns to find the crew of the Enterprise addicted to a dangerous new game.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Unification (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 7 Picard and Mr. Spock clash over a proposed reunification of the Romulans and the Vulcans.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Unification (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 Picard and Data travel to investigate an unauthorized mission undertaken by the Federation's legendary Mr. Spock.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - A Matter of Time
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 Picard's quest to save an endangered planet leads him to violate a Prime Directive when he seeks advice from a visitor from the future.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - New Ground
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Worf learns some painful lessons about parenting when his son Alexander arrives to join his father on the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Hero Worship
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 A young boy who is the sole survivor of a devastated ship becomes obsessed with simulating Data.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Violations
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 Troi, Riker and Dr. Crusher fall into unexplained comas while the Enterprise plays host to an alien race.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Masterpiece Society
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 Picard's efforts to save a genetically engineered society from a natural disaster threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Conundrum
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 14 While suffering an unexplained case of amnesia, the crew finds themselves fighting a war they do not remember or understand.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Power Play
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 Inhabited by alien spirits, Data and Troi overthrow the Bridge of the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Ethics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 16 Loyalty and ethics clash when a paralyzed Worf asks to help him commit suicide.

programme.title: Battle Beyond The Stars - Battle Beyond The Stars
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young farmer sets out to recruit mercenaries to defend his peaceful planet, which is under threat of invasion by the evil tyrant Sador and his armada of aggressors.

programme.title: Dark Rising: Warrior of Worlds - Season's Change
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 This is a classic hero's story. Young local miner Nathan Mallstrom finds himself caught in the middle of an ancient battle for the Earth. Summer Vale, a super-soldier with demon DNA is there to guide him in the battle.

programme.title: Dark Rising: Warrior of Worlds - The Trankartak
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 This is a classic hero's story. Young local miner Nathan Mallstrom finds himself caught in the middle of an ancient battle for the Earth. Summer Vale, a super-soldier with demon DNA is there to guide him in the battle.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 118 - Mother's Day
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 18 Gadget is caught in a custody fight and leaves Sergeant Parks to be reunited with her real mother. RoboCop suspects the woman is part of a plot by Russian crime boss Vlad "Stitch" Molotov and his sexy moll, Nadia.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 119 - Nano
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 Officer Madigan is crippled in a mysterious bus crash and the lovely Diana Powers turns into a party animal as RoboCop fights a scientist and an ex-I.R.S. agent using microscopic machines to create the ultimate crime.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 120 - Corporate Raiders
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 The city is rocked by anti-corporate violence as RoboCop and Officer Madigan are assigned to bring in a charming ex-terrorist, but a corrupt union leader and his sultry secretary have other plans.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Still Valley
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 Confederacy scout Sgt. Joseph Paradine finds a town full of Union soldiers, and an old man who claims he used witchcraft to paralyze them.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Jungle
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Alan Richards plans to build a dam in Africa on a tribe's ancestral land. The tribe's witch doctor puts a curse on him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Once Upon a Time
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 Woodrow, a janitor living in the year 1890, accidentally activates a time traveling helmet which transports him to 1962 - then promptly breaks down.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Five Characters in Search of an Exit
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 A hobo, clown, bagpipe player, ballerina and military officer are trapped in a huge cylinder.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Quality of Mercy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 A gung-ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nothing in the Dark
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - One More Pallbearer
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 17 Paul Radin has invited three people to join him in his bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Dead Man's Shoes
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 18 A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E17 - Through The Looking Glass
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 17 Moya tries to starburst to prove to the crew that she still can. It goes slightly wrong though and she gets stuck in starburst.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E18 - A Bug's Life

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E19 - Nerve
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 Aeryn has been critically wounded. She needs some tissue samples to heal. The only source is the Secret base the Peacekeeper mentioned.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Spirit Folk
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 17 The Voyager crew makes first contact with a holodeck program.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Ashes To Ashes
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 18 Claiming to be a long-dead crewmember, an alien requests asylum on Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Child's Play
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 19 The Voyager crew must rescue a young boy being used as a weapon of destruction against the Borg

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 20 Janeway must tend to her flock when she finds three misfit crewmembers need some special attention.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Live Fast And Prosper
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 21 Impostors jeopardize Voyager's good reputation in the Delta Quadrant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Muse
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 22 Stranded during an away mission, B'Elanna finds herself the inspiration for a young poet's art.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fury
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 23 An old friend returns with a decidedly unfriendly plot to destroy Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Life Line
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 24 The Doctor seizes an opportunity to save the life of the man who created him.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Haunting Of Deck Twelve
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 25 Neelix recounts the harrowing tale of Voyager's newest uninvited guest.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unimatrix Zero, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 Captain Janeway faces her biggest battle yet against the Borg—assimilation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unimatrix Zero, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 1 Seven's long-lost love lures Janeway into a deadly encounter with the Borg Queen.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Imperfection
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 2 A malfunction in Seven's cortical node threatens to destroy her.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Drive
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 3 Tom and B'Elanna's relationship could be the loser when Tom enters a race.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 14
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 This episode includes: Death by Drowning, Update: Sweetheart Escape, Grandma's Grave and CIA Secrets.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 This episode includes: Medjugorje, Shack Fire, Dial A for Abduction and Missing Bank Executive.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 This episode includes: Falcon Lake UFO, Inside Frontera, UD: Loving's Lost Love and Disappearing Dad.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 18
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 18 This episode includes: Doris Duke & UD, UD: Foster Son, Vietnam Orphans, Puerto Rican Monster and Money From Heaven.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 18
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 This episode includes: Chicago Kidnap, Cash Web, Rachel Runyan, Sweetheart Swindler, Texas Crime Spree and Update: Fumbles Robber.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 19
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 19 This episode includes: Bank Tunnel, Life After Life Pts. 1 & 2, Update: Red Lake Heir and Repairman Death.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 17
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 17 This episode includes: Rosemary's Spirits, There's Something You Should Know & UD, Journey to Murder, Major Lazarus and Men in Black.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack: Episode: 8 - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 8 This episode includes: Battling for Her Brother & UD, UD: Johnny Lee Wilson, Kempton's Search & UD, Missing Bonnie & UD and Devil's Backbone.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 This episode includes: D.B. Cooper Pts 1 & 2, Update: Math Teacher Escape, Friends to the End & UD and Babe's Uniform & UD.

programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 This episode includes: DJ Death & UD, Update: Medford Millions, Missing Valentine Pts. 1 & 2 & UD, Update: Stroke Amnesia and Florida Flim Flam & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 This episode includes: Thumbs & UD, Update: Marsh, Conway, Honeymoon Bones and Dottie Caylor.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 9 This episode includes: Kilgore Isn't Here & UD, Myrtles Plantation and Gang Mom.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: The MST3K Turkey Day Marathon - The MST3K Turkey Day Marathon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2023 The annual Thanksgiving tradition continues. The Mega Turkey Day Marathon Telethon will showcase a whopping 24 classic MST3K episodes over the course of two days.

programme.title: The MST3K Turkey Day Marathon - The MST3K Turkey Day Marathon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2023 The annual Thanksgiving tradition continues. The Mega Turkey Day Marathon Telethon will showcase a whopping 24 classic MST3K episodes over the course of two days.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera - MST3K: Gamera
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger - MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.

programme.title: Meddling Mom - Meddling Mom
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A woman (Sonia Braga) urges her oldest daughter (Ana Ayora) to have a baby, while trying to play matchmaker for her youngest (Mercedes Renard).

programme.title: Midnight Masquerade - Midnight Masquerade
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young woman's life takes a turn when she inherits a billion-dollar company. On Halloween night, she shares a dance with a mysterious "prince" at a costume ball and yearns for the love and romance her life has been missing.

programme.title: Midway to Love - Midway to Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart. Stars Rachel Hendrix, Daniel Stine.

programme.title: Mom's Day Away - Mom's Day Away
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Laura Miller is a happily married mother of two, but as Mother's Day draws near, Laura begins to feel unappreciated in her household. She escapes with her friend for a Mother's Day break in Napa.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Cities - A Tale of Two Cities
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper - My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two sisters embark on a journey of discovery and reconciliation in this poignant real-life story based on the memoirs of Margaret Moorman.

programme.title: Missing Pieces - Missing Pieces
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Siege (Part 3)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 The team is saved with the arrival of Colonel Steven Caldwell, the Daedalus, and the destruction of the two approaching Wraith ships. McKay hopes the Zero Point Module will be the key to their success, meanwhile, Ford seems off after an accident.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Intruder
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Sheppard starts to question things when strange malfunctions begin to occur after the team returns from a trip to Earth. The team discovers that the Daedalus has been infected with a Wraith Virus, causing the ship to go into survival mode.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Runner
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 The search for Lt. Ford leads Sheppard and Teyla to planet P3M-736 where they are captured by Ronon Dex, a man who is on the run, being hunted by the Wraith. The team offers to help Ronon, going up against the Wraith once again.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Duet
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 While on Planet Thenora, the team is shocked when McKay and marine officer Laura Cadman are suddenly taken aboard a Wraith Dart. When the team shoots down the Dart, they discover a technical glitch has put Cadman's consciousness in McKay's body.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Faith
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Human
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Lost
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Stargate Universe - Sabotage
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Company Of Thieves
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 9 Lt. Col. Cameron Mitchell (Ben Browder) goes undercover to track down the Odyssey, which SG-1 believes was hijacked by the Lucian Alliance. Also starring Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Quest (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 10 SG-1 finds the planet where they believe the Sangraal is. Forced to forge temporary alliances with Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) they undertake a quest to find it. Starring Ben Browder and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Quest, The: Part II
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 11 Discovering the frozen body of Merlin (guest star Matthew Walker), SG-1 works to help him build the Sangraal before Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin) and her Ori army can track them down. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Line In The Sand
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 12 Hoping to use Merlin's phasing device to hide a village from the Ori army, something goes wrong forcing Mitchell (Ben Browder) and a critically injured Carter (Amanda Tapping) to hide themselves out of phase from an occupation of Ori soldiers.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Road Not Taken
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 13 An experiment goes wrong leaving Lt. Colonel Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) trapped in a parallel reality where martial law has been enforced and Earth is under attack from the Ori. Also starring Ben Browder, Christopher Judge, and Michael Shanks.
